column2: an A.M. Eatery////I've only been once but I'm not quite on the bandwagon. I had heard such wonderful things about Snooze
column3: and was SO excited to try their pancake flight
column4: but didn't feel like they were outstanding or unique. The rest of their menu seemed somewhat standard as well. I will be going back to give this place another shot and see if other menu items really stand out!
